content: **crocheted jumper in drops alpaca the piece is worked top down with treble crochets round yoke and lobster stitch sizes xs - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #seafoamserenitysweater drops design pattern z-1056 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 450-450-500-550-600-700-750 g colour 9037 light sea green **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 12 row in height on hook size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
